SELECT content, usersCode FROM question WHERE parentCode = #{num}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM question WHERE qnaCode = #{num} OR parentCode = #{num}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO question(qnaCode, gubun, subject, content, parentCode, usersCode) VALUES(question_seq.NEXTVAL, #{gubun}, #{subject}, #{content}, #{parentCode}, #{usersCode})
mapper.update: UPDATE question SET content = #{content} WHERE parentCode = #{qnaCode}
